summary: The chat auto-scroll fix correctly generalizes the previous exitSpec-only scroll logic to also handle the Generating indicator. It respects the isAtBottomRef to avoid scrolling when user has scrolled up manually.

notes: Unified scroll logic for both Generating indicator and SpecReviewCard footer content
Properly checks isAtBottomRef.current before scrolling - preserves manual scroll position
Uses computed booleans (showsGenerating, showsExitSpec, hasFooterContent) for clarity
Two-phase scroll approach (scrollToIndex then scrollBy after 150ms delay) handles footer render timing
Cleanup function properly clears timeout to prevent memory leaks

fulfillsAssessment.VAL-CHAT-001: addressed - showsGenerating triggers scroll when isRunning and lastMsgRole !== assistant
fulfillsAssessment.VAL-CHAT-002: addressed - showsExitSpec triggers scroll for SpecReviewCard (existing behavior preserved and improved)
